snippet.title: Rooms of Realities  - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Rooms of Realities is an anthology of virtual Escape Rooms that you can enjoy in co-op or solo mode. Discover the secret that connects all the rooms.

ADD TO WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1917810/Rooms_of_Realities/

The Game has three unique environments that are divided into a series of unique challenges. Unfold the mystery behind Emily Jones' disappearance inside abandoned hospital. Discover the ancient secret inside the pyramid. Reach the artifact that can save the world, hidden deep under the water by Captain Nemo!

More details will be announced soon. Follow our channels and announcements to stay up to date and see how Rooms of Realities is developing:

💬【𝙳𝙸𝚂𝙲𝙾𝚁𝙳】https://discord.gg/ZUQfuxgjru
📰【𝙵𝙰𝙲𝙴𝙱𝙾𝙾𝙺 https://www.facebook.com/Gamedust 
🦆【𝚃𝚆𝙸𝚃𝚃𝙴𝚁 https://twitter.com/GamedustTT 
📷【𝙸𝙽𝚂𝚃𝙰𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼】https://www.instagram.com/gamedust_studio/ 

+You can always visit official website of the game: https://roomsofrealities.com/
